amendment.description: An amendment numbered 239 printed in the Congressional Record to increase the funding levels for Pell grants without benefit of offsets.

action.text: Amendment (A052) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee (TX).

Mr. Rehberg raised a point of order against the Jackson Lee (TX) amendment (A052). Mr. Rehberg stated that the amendment proposes a net increase in budget authority in the bill. The Chair sustained the point of order.
